alert.note: Alert for Escambia; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... East Central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Northeastern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 439 PM CDT, Heavy showers and thunderstorms continue to develop and move across eastern Baldwin, Escambia, and Santa Rosa Counties this afternoon producing torrential rainfallrates. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Gulf Breeze, Bagdad, Oriole Beach, Navarre, Molino, Pea Ridge, Floridatown, Point Baker, Roeville, Pensacola Beach, Navarre Beach, Chumuckla, Harp, Mulat, Galt City, Quintette and Allentown. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
